00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : UpdateF
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00034 
00035  SUBROUTINE UpdateF
00036 
00037 ! Common Variables
00038  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00039  USE Domain
00040  USE FluidParams
00041  USE LBMParams
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044 ! Local Variables
00045  INTEGER :: i, j, xs1, xs2, xt1, xt2, xt3, ys1, ys2, yt1, yt2, yt3
00046 
00047 !--------- Interpolation of velocity and pressure on the order parameter mesh --
00048  DO j = yl, yu-1
00049    DO i = xl, xu-1
00050 
00051 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00052      xs1 = i
00053      ys1 = j
00054      xs2 = ni(i,j,1)
00055      ys2 = ni(i,j,2)
00056 
00057 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00058      xt1 = 2*i - 1
00059      yt1 = 2*j - 1
00060      xt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,1)
00061      yt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,2)
00062      xt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt2,1)
00063      yt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt2,2)
00064  
00065 ! Target 1
00066      u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = u(xs1,ys1,1)
00067      u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = u(xs1,ys1,2)
00068      p_f(xt1,yt1)   = p(xs1,ys1)
00069 
00070 ! Target 2
00071      u_f(xt2,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) )
00072      u_f(xt2,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) )
00073      p_f(xt2,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1) )
00074 
00075 ! Target 3
00076      u_f(xt3,yt1,1) = u(xs2,ys1,1)
00077      u_f(xt3,yt1,2) = u(xs2,ys1,2)
00078      p_f(xt3,yt1)   = p(xs2,ys1)
00079 
00080 ! Target 4
00081     u_f(xt1,yt2,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) )
00082     u_f(xt1,yt2,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) )
00083     p_f(xt1,yt2)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2) )
00084 
00085 ! Target 5
00086     u_f(xt2,yt2,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00087     u_f(xt2,yt2,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00088     p_f(xt2,yt2)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00089 
00090 ! Target 6
00091     u_f(xt3,yt2,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00092     u_f(xt3,yt2,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00093     p_f(xt3,yt2)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00094 
00095 ! Target 7
00096     u_f(xt1,yt3,1) = u(xs1,ys2,1)
00097     u_f(xt1,yt3,2) = u(xs1,ys2,2)
00098     p_f(xt1,yt3)   = p(xs1,ys2)
00099 
00100 ! Target 8
00101     u_f(xt2,yt3,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00102     u_f(xt2,yt3,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00103     p_f(xt2,yt3)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00104 
00105 ! Target 9
00106     u_f(xt3,yt3,1) = u(xs2,ys2,1)
00107     u_f(xt3,yt3,2) = u(xs2,ys2,2)
00108     p_f(xt3,yt3)   = p(xs2,ys2)
00109 
00110    END DO
00111  END DO
00112 
00113  IF ( xOffset == 1 ) THEN
00114    DO j = yl, yu-1
00115 
00116 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00117      xs1 = xlg
00118      ys1 = j
00119      xs2 = xl
00120      ys2 = ni(xlg,j,2)
00121 
00122 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00123      xt1 = xl_f
00124      yt1 = 2*j - 1
00125      yt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,2)
00126      yt3 = ni_f(xt1,yt2,2)
00127 
00128 ! Target 2
00129      u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) )
00130      u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) )
00131      p_f(xt1,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1) )
00132 
00133 ! Target 5
00134      u_f(xt1,yt2,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00135      u_f(xt1,yt2,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00136      p_f(xt1,yt2)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00137 
00138 ! Target 8
00139      u_f(xt1,yt3,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00140      u_f(xt1,yt3,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00141      p_f(xt1,yt3)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00142    END DO
00143  END IF
00144 
00145  IF ( yOffset == 1 ) THEN
00146   DO i = xl, xu-1
00147 
00148 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00149      xs1 = i
00150      ys1 = ylg
00151      xs2 = ni(i,ylg,1)
00152      ys2 = yl
00153 
00154 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00155      xt1 = 2*i - 1
00156      yt1 = yl_f
00157      xt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,1)
00158      xt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt1,1)
00159 
00160 ! Target 4
00161      u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) )
00162      u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) )
00163      p_f(xt1,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2) )
00164 
00165 ! Target 5
00166      u_f(xt2,yt1,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00167      u_f(xt2,yt1,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00168      p_f(xt2,yt1)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00169 
00170 ! Target 6
00171      u_f(xt3,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00172      u_f(xt3,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00173      p_f(xt3,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00174    END DO
00175  END IF
00176 
00177  IF ( xOffset == 1 .AND. yOffset == 1 ) THEN
00178 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00179      xs1 = xlg
00180      ys1 = ylg
00181      xs2 = xl
00182      ys2 = yl
00183 
00184 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00185      xt1 = xlg_f
00186      yt1 = ylg_f
00187 
00188 ! Target 5
00189      u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00190      u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00191      p_f(xt1,yt1)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00192  END IF
00193 
00194  RETURN
00195  END SUBROUTINE updateF
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:05 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
